title: Redeploy the app to ICP and provide the new live URL

requirements.text: Redeploy the current application build to the Internet Computer (ICP) so a fresh live version is available again (to address the userâ€™s request to redeploy).
acceptanceCriteria: A new live version is successfully deployed (no build/deploy failures).
The deployed app loads in the browser and reaches the main UI without runtime errors.

requirements.text: After the redeploy completes, surface the updated live app URL to the user in English.
acceptanceCriteria: The response includes the new/active live URL for the redeployed version.
The URL is clearly labeled as the live/production link.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text in this build request.

Do not modify files under frontend/immutablePaths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only introduce backend/migration.mo if a state migration is required (not expected for redeploy-only).
nonGoals: Fixing the Home page header alignment issue (Language selector vs Kids/Adults toggle).
Fixing the Home page StoryCard Like button behavior.
Adding new product features unrelated to redeployment.
